articles.title: Wildfire destroys a historic Grand Canyon lodge and other structures
articles.description: A wildfire has destroyed a historic Grand Canyon lodge and other structures [2].

articles.title: Chelsea beat PSG 3-0 in FIFA Club World Cup final
articles.description: Chelsea defeated PSG 3-0 to win the FIFA Club World Cup final [1].

articles.title: Nigeria's ex-President Muhammadu Buhari dies in London aged 82
articles.description: Nigeria's former president, Muhammadu Buhari, has died in London at the age of 82 [2, 3].
